Samantha Reed Smith (N'ọnwa June 29, 1972 ruo afọ August 25, 1985) bụ onye America na-eme udo na onye na-eme ihe nkiri ụmụaka si Manchester, Maine, onye ghọrọ onye a ma ama maka mgbasa ozi ya na-emegide agha n'oge Agha Nzuzo n'etiti United States na Soviet Union
N'afọ 1982, Smith degaara odeakwụkwọ ukwu a họpụtara ọhụrụ nke Communist Party nke Soviet Union, Yuri Andropov, akwụkwọ ozi ma nata nzaghachi onwe onye na oku ka ọ gaa Soviet Union, nke ọ nabatara.

Smith dọtara uche mgbasa ozi dị ukwuu na mba abụọ ahụ dị ka "Goodwill Ambassador", bụrụ onye a maara dị ka America's Youngest Ambassador ma mesịa sonye na ọrụ udo na Japan. Site n'enyemaka nke nna ya, Arthur, (onye agụmakwụkwọ), o dere akwụkwọ akpọrọ Journey to the Soviet Union, nke kọrọ banyere nleta ya na mba ahụ

O mechara bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nwatakịrị, na-akwado ihe nkiri pụrụ iche gbasara ụmụaka na ntuli aka onye isi ala United States nke 1984 maka The Disney Channel ma na-arụ ọrụ na usoro telivishọn Lime Street

Smith nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ n'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1985, n'ụgbọelu Bar Harbor Airlines Flight n'afọ 1808, nke dara n'ụzọ na-adịghị n'okporo ụzọ ụgbọ elu na nso ikpeazụ nke Auburn / Lewisiston Municipal Airport na Maine.
